penicillinAllergy.recommendation: Avoid penicillin-class antibiotics. Consider alternatives like macrolides or tetracyclines.

warfarinNsaid.description: Concurrent use significantly increases the risk of major bleeding, especially gastrointestinal bleeding.
warfarinNsaid.recommendation: Avoid combination if possible. If necessary, monitor INR closely and check for signs of bleeding. Consider PPI for GI protection.

nsaidKidneyDisease.description: NSAIDs can reduce renal blood flow and cause acute kidney injury in patients with pre-existing kidney disease.
nsaidKidneyDisease.recommendation: Avoid NSAIDs. Consider alternative analgesics like acetaminophen.

aceInhibitorKidneyDisease.description: ACE inhibitors can affect kidney function. Use with caution in patients with renal impairment.
aceInhibitorKidneyDisease.recommendation: Start with a low dose and monitor serum creatinine and potassium levels regularly.
